title: Baguette Diamond Bangle
materials: 14.210 gms Gold. Features round cut diamonds set around baguette cut diamonds. Includes 1.11ct weight in the metal and gemstones. D BG has 0.12ct and D BG(>3Mm) has 0.53ct
features: This exquisite bangle features a contemporary design with an array of perfectly cut baguette diamonds. Each diamond is carefully set to maximize brilliance and sparkle. The rose gold provides a warm and inviting contrast to the icy sparkle of the diamonds.
occasions: or as a luxurious daily wear piece. A dazzling statement for any special occasion.
description: Exceptional brilliance and fire from meticulously selected diamonds. Comfortable to wear, this bangle makes a statement and an heirloom.
